_xResult.title: Anywhere Is Away Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made gold silk dress with sequin embellishment
_xResult.longdesc:
This custom made sequin dress flaunts a unique golden color, made using 100% silk fabric. You'll feel luxurious in the soft-brushed fabric and with the embellishment around the waistin a spectacular sequin band. The balloon sleeves add the element of elegance to this dress and make it perfect for a formal event or a wekeend party.

Fit of this dress: Regular

The customizations available in this dress are:

Neckline: Round, U Neck, V Neck

Dress Length: Above Knees, Knee Length, Below Knees

Colors: Gold, Emerald Green, Wine
